name: Leia, Optimistic Leader
Lore: 'Spy. After escaping Detention Block AA-23. Rebels found themselves in the trash compactor. Leia point out, ''It could be worse.'' It soon was.',
Text: 'Adds 1 to power of anything she pilots. Dark Jedi deploy +1 here. May move as a ''react'' (one other Rebel present may move with her). While armed with Leia''s Sporting Blaster, its weapon destiny draws are +1 and Leia is power +1. Immune to attrition < 3.',
